name: johnny-decimal
title: Johnny Decimal
description: Navigate and interact with your Johnny.Decimal system
author: edoardo_baldi

preferences.name: rootFolder
preferences.title: Root Folder
preferences.description: Path to your active Johnny.Decimal root folder. To register multiple systems, point this to each root and run Rebuild Index â€” then use Switch System to move between them.

preferences.name: indexFilePath
preferences.title: Index File
preferences.description: Custom path for this system's .jdex.json index (defaults to root folder). Each registered system stores its own index.

preferences.name: searchSensitivity
preferences.title: Search Sensitivity
preferences.description: Controls how fuzzy the Search All matching is.

commands.name: rebuild-index
commands.title: Rebuild Index
commands.description: Rebuild the index of your Johnny.Decimal system.

commands.name: search-all
commands.title: Search All
commands.description: Fuzzy search across all Johnny.Decimal entries.

commands.name: check-index
commands.title: Check Index
commands.description: Validate index consistency against the filesystem.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
